meanings.definition: In a way that shows intense and eager enjoyment, interest, or approval.
meanings.sent1: She clapped enthusiastically at the end of the play.
meanings.sent2: The children cheered enthusiastically during the game.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail enthusiastically when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed enthusiastically after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The students listened enthusiastically to the guest speaker.

meanings.sent1: He ran enthusiastically towards the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The fans cheered enthusiastically for their team.
meanings.sent3: The toddler danced enthusiastically to the music.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew the leaves off the trees enthusiastically.
meanings.sent5: The chef cooked the meal enthusiastically for the guests.
